title: Hard Chews - Male Performance Support
question: What is HardChews?
answer: HardChews is a dietary supplement formulated to support male performance and vitality. It is chewable, convenient, and designed to be taken as directed on the product label.

title: How to use Hard Chews
question: How should I take HardChews?
answer: Please follow the usage instructions on the product label. Do not exceed the recommended daily dose. If you have any medical condition or are taking medication, consult your doctor before use.
